replies.body: Hmmmmm the NA servers aren't currently having any issues, so I'm not entirely sure why you're unable to sign in. I'd first suggest checking up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is looking good in there. If that doesn't help hit me back up with a little more info as to what kind of errors you're seeing.
